DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare effect CT327 placebo experimental induce superficial , deep hyperalgesic pain . The secondary objective elucidate mechanism CT327 use experimental pain model .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Pharmacodynamic Effects CT327 Intra-dermal Nerve Growth Factor ( NGF ) Evoked Pain Responses , Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Subjects must able understand content study , comply study willing sign inform consent Subjects must free clinically significant illness disease determine medical history , physical examination , laboratory test All male subject must take adequate contraceptive precaution course study 30 day participation study end Participation clinical study within 3 month screen Scheduled surgery , medical treatment hospital admission would fall within study Use strong painkiller Use analgesic within 24 hour start study Use regular course prescribe medication and/or herbal medicine The presence lesion , significant scar , cut , wound , dermal abnormality , tattoo naevi test area A past history contact dermatitis , psoriasis keloid Any clinically significant ECG abnormality screen A history drug allergy contraindicate participation . Regular average consumption 21 unit alcohol per week ( one unit alcohol equal approximately 250 mL beer , 125 mL wine 20 mL spirit ) . Smokes five cigarette ( average ) per day , smoker 5 cigarette ( average ) per day within 3 month prior screen . A known history drug alcohol abuse . As result medical screening process , PI medical delegate considers subject unfit study . Use prescription medication within 2 week 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) dose . Use nonprescription medication ( e.g . aspirin , vitamins herbal dietary supplement ) within 7 day prior dose , 14 day medication contain grapefruit/ grapefruit juice St John 's Wort .
